author: Flame442
install_msg: Thanks for installing onlinestats. Commands are `[p]onlinestats` and `[p]onlineinfo`.
name: OnlineStats
short: View information about whether users on your server are using discord on desktop or mobile.
description: View information about whether users on your server are using discord on desktop or mobile, or what device a particular user is using. Run [p]onlinestats or [p]onlineinfo to see this information.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
